item.title: Demi Moore Winning Best Actress Would Continue A Weirdly Specific 3-Year Oscars Trend
item.description: If Demi Moore wins an Oscar for her turn in The Substance, then she’ll be the third Best Actress winner in a row from a bizarre sci-fi movie role.

item.title: This Matrix Character Was Older Than The Oracle And Predated Every Version Of The One That Came Before Neo
item.description: One character from The Matrix franchise is even older than The Oracle and was around long before any of the pre-Neo candidates for The One.

item.title: Alien’s Most Important Deleted Scene Would’ve Changed The Franchise Forever (James Cameron’s Aliens Might’ve Never Happened)
item.description: One deleted scene from Alien (1979) would have changed Ridley Scott's entire franchise and made Aliens, Prometheus, and Covenant nearly impossible.
